ai_answer_generator_description: Unlock the power of the best AI answer generator. Experience the ease and efficiency of our free AI, designed to provide accurate and instant answers to your questions.
ai_answer_generator_faq_artificial_intel: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a branch of computer science focused on creating systems capable of performing tasks that typically require human intelligence. These tasks include problem-solving, learning, reasoning, perception, and understanding natural language.
ai_answer_generator_intro_text: Hi! How can I help you?

privacy_policy_cookie_is_small_file: A cookie is a small file placed on Your Device. You can instruct Your browser to refuse all Cookies or to indicate when a Cookie is being sent. However, if You do not accept Cookies, You may not be able to use some parts of our Service. Unless you have adjusted Your browser setting so that it will refuse Cookies, our Service may use Cookies.
privacy_policy_cookies_can_be_persistent: Cookies can be «Persistent» or «Session» Cookies. Persistent Cookies remain on Your personal computer or mobile device when You go offline, while Session Cookies are deleted as soon as You close Your web browser. You can learn more about cookies on TermsFeed website article.

why_do_you_need_account_description: Well, we get it – we're not fans of signing up for stuff online either. But, alas, we had to do it to ensure your progress is saved and synced up. Without the whole registration thing, the cool features you now enjoy in Corgi wouldn't have been possible.
why_do_you_need_account_item_1_text: Your data? It's like Fort Knox – we don't share it with a soul.
why_do_you_need_account_item_2_text: Encryption is our middle name – all your info is under lock and key.
why_do_you_need_account_item_3_text: No spam! We don't hit you with marketing messages unless you've given us the green light.
